ResourceHeader.ResourceName: SESAME VLF/ELF Logger Experiment, Key Parameters
ResourceHeader.Description: This set of key parameters from the SESAME (Satellite Experiments Simultaneous with Antarctic Measurements) ground-based experiment contains omni-directional intensities (dB) in 2 narrow passband filters centred on 1kHz and 3kHz. Please see reference: Dudeney, J. R. et. al., Satellite Experiments Simultaneous with Antarctic Measurements (SESAME), Space Science Reviews, Volume 71, Issue 1-4, pp. 705-742, 1995.

AccessURL.Description: In CDF via HTTP from CDAWeb

AccessInformation.Acknowledgement: Please acknowledge data provider, J.R. Dudeney at the British Antarctic Survey and SPDF when using these data.
